Package controller.gameController

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.gameController.GameController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InfiniteGameController, NormalGameController
    public abstract class GameController
extends java.lang.Object

    GameController

    This class is the basic class for game stages refactored from the original World. It contains methods to update the game information for example: Scores, life and remaining time. It keeps the FroggerView simultaneously, and it will change the status od each end in every 5 seconds.
    Each of those data has 2 methods:
    1. Initialise;
    2. Update.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Kejia Wu, scykw1@nottingham.ac.uk
    See Also:
    FroggerView

    • Method Detail

      • initGameStage

        public void initGameStage()
        This function initialise the game stage Pane and add two Key board event listener to the Pane to observe player's keyboard inputs.

      • changeEnd

        public static void changeEnd()
        This function changes the status of ends, there is going to be only one pair of CrocEnd and BugEnd exist simultaneously at most. And if there is only one End left, it will be set to BugEnd.

      • initInfo

        public void initInfo​(java.lang.String gameMode)
        This method will initialize the game information demonstration according to the mode of game stage. It will use FileProcessor to read the high score file and get present high score. The initialised components include:
        1. Life;
        2. Score;
        3. Remaining time;
        4. Game mode;
        5. Present high score.
        Parameters:
        gameMode - Present game's mode

      • initScore

        public void initScore​(int presentScore)
        This method initialise player's present score and display it to the player.
        Parameters:
        presentScore - Player's present score

      • initTime

        public void initTime​(int presentTime)
        This method initialise player's present remaining time and display it to the player.
        Parameters:
        presentTime - Player's present remaining time

      • initLife

        public void initLife​(int presentLife)
        This method initialise player's present life and display it to the player.
        Parameters:
        presentLife - Player's present life

      • initGameMode

        public void initGameMode​(java.lang.String gameMode)
        Initialize the game mode demonstration
        Parameters:
        gameMode - The mode of the present mode

      • initHighScore

        public void initHighScore​(int highScore)
        Initialize the demonstration of the highest score player has achieved presently. And it could demonstrate it to the player.
        Parameters:
        highScore - Present highest score player has achieved.

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore​(int presentScore)
        This method updates player's present score
        Parameters:
        presentScore - Present score player gaines

      • updateTime

        public void updateTime​(int presentTime)
        This method updates player's present remaining time, if the time is less than 60 seconds, it will be demonstrated in orange and if it is less than 30, it will be demonstrated in red.
        Parameters:
        presentTime - Present remaining time player has

      • updateLife

        public void updateLife​(int presentLife)
        This method updates player's present life number, if the life is less than 3, it will be demonstrated in orange, and if it is less than 2, which means it is the last chance, it will be demonstrated in red.
        Parameters:
        presentLife - Present life player has

      • stopGame

        public void stopGame()
        Stop current game stage.

        private <A extends View> java.util.ArrayList<A> getObjects​(java.lang.Class<A> cls)

        Type Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkPause

        public boolean checkPause()
        Check whether player wants to pause the game.
        Returns:
        True, if it is been paused, false otherwise.

      • checkRestart

        public boolean checkRestart()
        Check whether player wants to restart the game.
        Returns:
        True, if it is been paused, false otherwise.

        public void act​(long timer)

        Parameters:
